title: Will Quantum Computing Kill Bitcoin?
description: Quantum computers could theoretically break Bitcoin's encryption threatening the investments of 500 million global holders and trillions in market value.
content: Quantum computers could theoretically break Bitcoin's encryption and destroy the cryptocurrency ... More overnight, threatening the investments of 500 million global holders and trillions in market v… [+5136 chars]
